name: Ageing of pending amount
query:
SELECT
    name AS "Membership:Link/Library Membership:120",
    from_date AS "ISsue Date:Date:100",
    due_date AS "Due Date:Date:100",
    library_member AS "Member:Link/Library Member:120",
    balance_amount AS "Balance Amount:Currency:120",
    CASE
        WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), due_date) <= 30 THEN balance_amount
        ELSE 0 END AS "0-30 Days:Currency:100",
    CASE
        WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), due_date) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), due_date) <= 60 THEN balance_amount
        ELSE 0 END AS "31-60 Days:Currency:100",
    CASE
        WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), due_date) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), due_date) <= 90 THEN balance_amount
        ELSE 0 END AS "61-90 Days:Currency:100",
    CASE
        WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), due_date) > 90 THEN balance_amount
        ELSE 0 END AS ">90 Days:Currency:100"
FROM
    `tabLibrary Membership`
WHERE
    docstatus = 1
ORDER BY
    due_date;
